name: Bunny Forest Mayhem
description:
STORY: "A little rabbit that woke up in a strange destroyed laboratory in the middle of the forest. apparently the rabbit is intelligent and notices that something was inserted into his arm to shoot. Elements of the forest have come to life and seem to be going against the little rabbit.


Apparently he has no choice but to fight to break through and get ahead. And maybe find out who he is and where that big cannon on his arm comes from, and more importantly the lab. The place where he woke up with no previous memories..."

Make your way with your cannon in this small and curious adventure. to find out the truth about all this. watch out for countless hordes of enemies and always stay on the move. do whatever it takes to survive and overcome countless challenges

(this is our first level. hope you enjoy!)
